title: Feno
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Arthur A. Goldberg
provenance_text:
Emil Schumacher [1912-1999], Hagen, Germany; Samuel M. Kootz Gallery, New York, NY, by October 1961 until 1971 [1]; Mr. and Mrs. Arthur A. Goldberg, New York, NY, by October 1971 until December 9, 1971 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1971.

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was included (no. 347, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Samuel M. Kootz Gallery. See copy of Museum Committee minutes, October 14, 1971.
[2]. See copy of correspondence with Mr. Goldberg in curatorial file.
